allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement Week 1-4 MVP features

Week 1-2: Database & Data Collection
- Setup Turso database with Drizzle ORM
- Define schema (media_sources, articles, tags, article_tags, crawl_logs)
- Implement Qiita API client with authentication
- Implement Zenn API client
- Create article collection batch endpoint with error handling
- Add trend score calculation algorithm
- Seed initial media sources data

Week 3-4: Frontend & API
- Implement REST API endpoints (articles, tags, media-sources)
- Add pagination, filtering, sorting, and search functionality
- Create responsive article card component
- Build filter bar with media/period/tag/search filters
- Add sidebar with popular tags cloud and stats
- Implement header with navigation
- Setup layout with sticky header and sidebars
- Add loading and error states

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
